summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 34th Avenue Northwest from West 62nd Street to West 68th Street; 36th Avenue Northwest from West 62nd Street to West 65th Street; 37th Avenue Northwest from West 64th Street to West 65th Street; West 65th Street from Seaview Avenue to 32nd Avenue Northwest; West 67th Street from 32nd Avenue Northwest to 35th Avenue Northwest; West 68th Street from 32nd Avenue Northwest to 35th Avenue Northwest; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2826 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
